.. _`design_system_components_relationshiptreetable`:

RelationshipTreeTable
=====================

.. figure:: images/component_relationshiptreetable.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Renders a set of relations as a tree table along with a toolbar for display configuration and operations.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.objectwidgets.ConnectedRelationshipTreeTable.ConnectedRelationshipTreeTable`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_relationshiptable`
